name: places/ChIJ75kdgfdYwokRByasVCT7rko
formattedAddress: 170 W 56th St, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 170 W 56th St, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text:
Ineffective Support: Solely relying on an online help desk made addressing critical issues, like server-related downtime and SSL configuration problems, frustrating and time-consuming.

Performance Concerns: Frequent downtime and inconsistent performance negatively impacted the reliability of my website.

Value for Money: While the service started cheap, the overall lack of support and service reliability made it poor value for money.

Refund Policy: Upon canceling my account due to ongoing issues, ASPHostPortal refused to offer a refund for the unused portion of the subscription, reflecting a lack of customer-oriented policies.

In summary, my time with ASPHostPortal was characterized by unreliable service and inadequate support. I recommend considering alternative hosting providers with a more customer-centric approach.

originalText.text: Worst user experience. Unable to reset password and slow customer service that lead to recurring payment that couldn't cancel for 3 years.
